ing: 1 (1.69 ounce) package candy-coated milk chocolate pieces
des: "This is an easy, quick recipe. I usually put in either a small packet of M&M'sÂ® or a Kit-KatÂ® bar. I love it! The measurement of the ingredients don't have to be PERFECT. Eat this as if you eat ice cream. Scoop it and eat it."
ins: Place the marshmallows and peanut butter in a saucepan over medium heat, and stir constantly until the marshmallows have melted and the mixture is smooth. Stir in the candy. Pour into a bowl, and let cool; eat slightly warm or cool.
